title: Kafka keep retrying when broker is not available
body:
### Describe the bug

I am setting below properties in application. properties but it's not working when broker is down .it is keep retrying n number times. I want to retry only trice. 

kafka. retry-attempts=3



### Expected behavior

It should retry 3 times

### Actual behavior

Keep retrying n number of times

### How to Reproduce?

Start zookeeper
Don't start kafka broker then start the application
